testcase.name: Bank Sort code UI Validation
testcase.system-out: Given I am on on the website................................................passed When User enters valid SortCode "111111"....................................passed And User clicks the search button...........................................passed Then Expected results "Payments made to this account will be successful."...passed And User sees the clear search button.......................................passed And User sees the bank name and address "Bank name and address".............passed And I close browser.........................................................passed
